      category Library
      package BCA/CURL
      author Brodkin CyberArts
      copyright 2012 Brodkin CyberArts.

       Methods

      Populate Data

      __construct(string $response, array $info, array $error) 

      Parameters

      $response

      string

      Data received from cURL request.

      $info

      array

      Array returned from curl_getinfo().

      $error

      array

      Array of error data, if applicable.
